entry.title: 'I'm Not a Diplomat…I'm a Mom.' The American Parents Thrust Into the Israeli Hostage Crisis
entry.content: When U.S.-born Hersh Goldberg-Polin was taken captive by Hamas attackers at a music festival in Israel, his parents launched a desperate quest for information and help.

entry.title: U.S. Push for Gaza Border Opening Stalls as Humanitarian Plight Worsens
entry.content: The U.S. is struggling to get Americans out of the Palestinian enclave and humanitarian aid into it as Israel’s ground offensive looms.
